sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Contact = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ service: '', name: '', email: '', phone: '', address: '', details: '' }); const [estimate, setEstimate] = useState(null); const [submitted, setSubmitted] = useState(false); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Simple estimate calculation based on service type let basePrice = 0; switch (formData.service) { case 'delivery': basePrice = 25; break; case 'moving': basePrice = 120; break; case 'junk-removal': basePrice = 85; break; default: basePrice = 50; } const estimatedPrice = basePrice + Math.floor(Math.random() * 50); setEstimate(estimatedPrice); setSubmitted(true); // Reset form after 5 seconds setTimeout(() => { setSubmitted(false); setEstimate(null); setFormData({ service: '', name: '', email: '', phone: '', address: '', details: '' }); }, 5000); }; return (
